title: Uber sued by thousands of Australian taxi drivers in class action
text: An Australian law firm has filed a class action against Uber on behalf of thousands of taxi and chartered drivers in Australia, accusing the world's largest ride-hailing company of operating illegally and causing them financial harm.

title: Early Uber advisor Bradley Tusk looks back — and forward — as its IPO fast approaches
text: Bradley Tusk’s story is well-known by now. A political operative who managed Michael Bloomberg’s successful third mayoral campaign, Tusk soon turned a bonus from his powerful boss into an opportunity that most people can only dream about.

title: The Ratings Game: Uber isn’t public yet, but it’s already nabbed a bullish analyst call
text: Uber Technologies Inc.’s initial public offering isn’t expected until next week, but analysts already have ideas about whether future shares are a buy.

title: Huawei Has Taken Over Apple's Market Share In China; It Will Get Worse
text: Wait until Hauwei launches its own operating system. Then even Google will have a new rival.

title: America's Huawei fight is of no concern to the UAE, Dubai A.I. executive says
text: The U.S.'s campaign against Chinese tech companies like Huawei doesn't seem to be working in Dubai.

title: 20 Top Stocks For A Monthly Dividend Portfolio: 2-Year Update
text: In July 2017, I wrote what has turned out to be my most popular article for this platform.

title: SpaceX confirms its Dragon crew capsule exploded in testing
text: For the first time after a video of an exploding Dragon capsule leaked in late April, SpaceX confirmed the spacecraft’s destruction during testing.

title: A SpaceX capsule built to fly humans was 'destroyed' during testing in Florida, company VP says
text: A top SpaceX official on Thursday confirmed reports that one of the company's Crew Dragon capsules was completely lost during testing in April.

title: NaturalShrimp: Game-Changing Lucrative Patent On Raising Shrimp
text: Raising shrimp is a multi-billion dollar business, but bacterial and viral diseases and the build-up of ammonia and nitrate have stymied all sustained attempts at raising shrimp.

title: How a British grocer thinks it can beat Amazon at its own game
text: Britain’s second biggest supermarket chain plans to compete head-on with Amazon AMZN, -1.23% in selling third-party products and services.

title: Oil markets face three possible scenarios in Venezuela
text: RBC Capital Markets' Helima Croft and her team have examined three possible scenarios for Venezuela and oil markets.

title: No, The China Trade War Has Not Destroyed U.S. Trade
text: Only the farm belt and Hawaii have seen declines in goods trade with China, while services trade is all up.

title: Plum, the money management chatbot, raises another $4.5M and lands on iOS
text: Plum, the chatbot-based app that helps you manage your money, is disclosing $4.5 million in further funding.

title: Investor group demands changes to Uber's board ahead of IPO
text: Investor group CtW called for the removal of John Thain from Uber's board and said the board's composition "falls short of best practices."

title: Once a major name in smartphones, LG Mobile is now irrelevant — and still losing money
text: LG was once a stalwart of the smartphone industry, but today the company is swiftly descending into irrelevance.
